Plot: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.
Title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
Writer: Eric Roth (screenplay), Eric Roth (story), Robin Swicord (story), F. Scott Fitzgerald (short story)
Actors: Cate Blanchett, Brad Pitt, Julia Ormond, Faune Chambers Watkins
tomatoConsensus: Curious Case of Benjamin Button is an epic fantasy tale with rich storytelling backed by fantastic performances.
